details.report_sql: SELECT DISTINCT sys_sw_software.software_name, sys_sw_software.software_version, COUNT(*) AS count_item, sys_sw_software.software_id, ROUND(100 / (SELECT COUNT(sys_sw_software.system_id) FROM sys_sw_software, system, oa_group_sys WHERE system.system_id = oa_group_sys.system_id AND sys_sw_software.timestamp = system.timestamp AND sys_sw_software.system_id = system.system_id AND ((sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Basic%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Enterprise%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Home and Student%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Personal%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Professional%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Small Business Edition%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Standard%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Ultimate%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Media%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP PIPC%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Professional%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Small Business%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Standard%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Web Server%') AND oa_group_sys.group_id = @group)) * COUNT(*), 1) As percentage FROM sys_sw_software, system, oa_group_sys WHERE system.system_id = oa_group_sys.system_id AND sys_sw_software.timestamp = system.timestamp AND sys_sw_software.system_id = system.system_id AND (oa_group_sys.group_id = @group AND (sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Basic%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Enterprise%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Home and Student%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Personal%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Professional%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Small Business Edition%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Standard%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office Ultimate%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Media%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP PIPC%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Professional%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Small Business%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Standard%' OR sys_sw_software.software_name LIKE 'Microsoft Office XP Web Server%')) Group By sys_sw_software.software_name, sys_sw_software.software_version
